content.raw:
I did verify that the light buoy colors are showing up both in the GUI and via the camera feeds.

However, there is a significant delay between what is in the GUI and in the camera view.  After running for a while \(~5-10 minutes\) the camera view lagged the GUI view by one full cycle - in the screenshot below the light buoy in the gui \(showing blue\) is ahead of the camera \(showing green\).  

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1624379947-Screenshot_from_2019-04-12_19-21-04.png)
I’ll clean up the setup and take a little video.
content.html:
I did verify that the light buoy colors are showing up both in the GUI and via the camera feeds.

However, there is a significant delay between what is in the GUI and in the camera view. After running for a while (~5-10 minutes) the camera view lagged the GUI view by one full cycle - in the screenshot below the light buoy in the gui (showing blue) is ahead of the camera (showing green).

I’ll clean up the setup and take a little video.
